text: Debre Zebit is a village in northern Ethiopia. It is about 45 km south of Addis Ababa. Debre Zebit is in the Amhara Region of Ethiopia. 132,000 people live in Debre Zebit. The Battle of Anchem which killed Ras Gugsa Welle was in Debre Zebit. ==References== Category:Settlements in Ethiopia
title: Debre Zebit
